desc: The Voice Clinic is a SETA-accredited B-BEEE LEVEL 2 company and an international leader in voice and presentation skills training since 1988.

layout.text: Change Your Voice, Change Your Life!

Need to improve your Confidence & Communication or Business Presentation Skills? The Voice Clinic provides Face to Face Training and/or Online Remote Speaking & Voice Training Courses via Zoom and/or Skype. Simply choose the Online Training option on the courses listed.

We provide Personalised Voice Training Courses as well as Confidence, Public Speaking Courses, English Pronunciation and Good Speech Courses.

These Courses are now all available Live Online using Zoom or Skype as well as Face to Face training, using Covid-19 protocols at our Nationwide Training Centres.
